DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Moviprep or Phosphoral is the best method of bowel preparation before colonoscopy - seen by the patients and by the endoscopist.
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Oral Preparation With Macrogol (Moviprep) and Natriumdihydrogenphosphatdihydrat (Phosphoral)
DOC.criteria: primary diagnostic colonoscopy, colonoscopy as a followup, intended therapeutic colonoscopy. patients younger than 18 years pregnancy known bowl obstructions known inflammatory colon disease known kidney disease phenylketonuri glucose6phospat deficiency
